item.title: How to Configure a Webserver to Be Less Secure
item.description: This question sounds odd. Why would you want a less secure web server? Well, maybe you have to support older clients. e.g. IE 11 on Windows 8.1 or Java 7 (cough) cannot connect to a web server, which only uses modern and secure ciphers. From a Java application, which cannot be updated, but has to work, I got the following exception: Exception in thread "main" javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: Received fatal alert: handshake_failure at sun.
